title: A godlie sermon preched before the Queenes Maiestie at Grenevvich the 26. of March last past by Doctor VVhitgift Deane of Lincolne.
author: Whitgift, John, 1530?-1604.
publisher: By Henry Bynneman, for Humfrey Toy,
notes: "Seen and allowed according to the order appoynted."
